comment.author: 46637723@N04
comment._content:
Colonel Rusham was my senior Marine Instructor for 3 years at Venice High School in the Marine Corps JROTC program. I wouldn't even know where to begin to help people understand what kind of man & Marine the Colonel was. I am proud to say that I am the man I am today because of Colonel John Rusham. 

RIP Colonel.. I'll never forget you.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
